name: DroidWeather
body:
### DroidWeather
Welcome to the project page for the DroidWeather Android app. Details on my development of the app will be described here. The source code for my project can be downloaded in a tar.gz or zip file. The Eclipse IDE (with the Android Developer Tools plugin installed) may be used to view and edit the source code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
